About catalyx

Catalysts of Social and Economic Growth

Catalyx is a development consulting firm committed to developing unique solutions to combat social challenges in South Africa. Catalyx offers a variety of complimentary services, both for the public and private sectors.

DISCOVER MORE

Joe White

Founder / CEO

  • Catalytic and innovative solutions
  • Clear and measurable results

specialized services

B-BBEE SERVICES

Catalyx provides consulting services around all the elements of the B-BBEE codes, namely:

  • BEE strategic advice/planning
  • BEE audit preparation and support
